name: MRLab
summary: Experience the world of Mixed Reality in one app. Build and experiment in a physics sandbox, defend your surroundings from waves of enemies, and bring virtual animals into your home. Each mini-game merges the virtual and real worlds, offering a hands-on look at how Mixed Reality can transform ordinary spaces into interactive playgrounds.  MRLab features three distinct levels: Physics Playground, Tower Defense, and Home Zoo. Ready to dive in?
